OrgName.entry: EQUIPMENT AND ADAPTATIONS FOR DISABLED PEOPLE

Desc.entry: City Council service. Conversions may be made in the house to help disabled people, although the criteria are very strict. Help available includes items of equipment, smaller adaptations and major adaptations to property. New referrals should be made to the Adult Access Call Centre, Tel 0114 273 4908. Self or any referral.

Pubs.entry: Leaflets available in various languages on request
